ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Resist question
ygData.msgSnippet: When we do Innoruuk we all fight in a corner with our backs to the wall. Innoruuk is happy to face us.  In this position his gravity flux doesn t throw us out
ygData.messageBody:
When we do Innoruuk we all fight in a corner with our backs to the wall.
Innoruuk is happy to face us. In this position his gravity flux doesn't
throw us out the door and potentially bring trains of mobs back. When I'm
gravity fluxed I turn and run against the wall as I come down (old Quake
reflexed kicking in). Their does appear to be some slowing of the fall
cause by my friction against the wall. I have not died to a gflux since
I've been doing that trick. *shrug* Could be just luck.

[48 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work

> From: <kim@...>
>
> I've yet to resist Innoruk's gravity flux, but for some reason
> high MR seems to decrease the damage you take from it. The
> first time I fought him, I got tossed 3-4 times before my hp
> bar ever showed any white.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
